trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown by several <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> internal helper APIs.
trans-unit.target: 由數個 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader" /> 內部 Helper API 擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新構成經由資料流傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor; or it returns `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或其傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。
